reviews.review_msg: Nice and funny prof. chem366 is not as bad as ppl say. it is deadly hard if you are always doing things at last minute. Just do the labs at normal times and ask for help if needed. i recommend brodovitch=)

He's very nice and funny. Most of the time he's easy to find and willing to help. I couldn't understand anything he said because of his accent until he taught me again in this course. If you get stuck on the lab report, just bring your file and ask him for help!

very helpful and friendly prof
 knows the stuff well and explains the material well
 no final exam!! 
 a challenging course though, lots of write up
Very helpful teacher! Boring course, lots of write up, take too much time, not very useful
very very amusing...and excellent at explaning course material
